name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John M. HOPPER, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John M. HOPPER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Lester G. Nauhaus, John H. Corbett, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
378 A.2d 861
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John M. HOPPER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 7, 1977.
Decided Oct. 28, 1977.
Lester G. Nauhaus, John H. Corbett, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
